about_the_game:
The 10-Track Soundtrack for Beef Cat Ultra composed by Andrew James Smith.

The chiptune rock soundtrack captures the vibes we set out to find with Beef Cat Ultra perfectly. Across the 10 tracks in the soundtrack, you go on a musical trip with loads of musical influences depending on the in-game context of the track.

Proceeds from the soundtrack go directly back to the composer and a bit to us as a developer. It's a way to show support for the people that made the game and get something fun out of it!
